title: Manufacturing Performance Dashboard
tag: Power BI • SQL Server • KPI Reporting
description: Designed and built a Power BI dashboard that consolidates production, downtime, and labor efficiency metrics across multiple manufacturing facilities.
points: Reduced manual reporting time by replacing Excel-based reports.
Enabled leadership to quickly identify bottlenecks and trends.
Improved visibility into performance KPIs across sites.

title: WMS & Shipping Data Integration
tag: SQL Server • ETL • SCALE WMS • FSMS
description: Developed and maintained data integrations between Manhattan SCALE WMS and FedEx Ship Manager Server to ensure consistent, accurate shipment and inventory data across systems.
points: Created ETL routines and SQL jobs to synchronize key data elements.
Improved data reliability for operational and logistics reporting.
Supported audit and compliance requirements across facilities.

title: Service Operations Analytics
description: Built internal dashboards and automations to monitor service desk performance, ticket volume, SLA compliance, and user satisfaction.
points: Created Power BI reports using ServiceNow data exports.
Implemented Power Automate flows to streamline ticket routing.
Helped leadership understand workload, trends, and improvement areas.

title: Custom C# Tools for Plant Operations
description: Developed C# applications integrated with SQL Server to support specific manufacturing and operations use cases, replacing manual or legacy processes.
points: Automated repetitive data entry and lookup tasks.
Reduced error rates and improved data consistency.
Provided more usable interfaces for plant staff.
